SEARCH

Class UserInfo

java.lang.Object
UserInfo
public class UserInfo extends Object
This class stores all the basic info about the user, like their height, weight, goal, age, and gender. It’s kind of like a profile that other parts of the app can use to personalize workouts or track progress. All the fields are private, so we use getters and setters to access and update them safely.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    UserInfo()
    Default constructor for creating a blank user profile.
